## Erc721Burnable.fromSelf() method

Burn NFTs

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
fromSelf(tokenId: BigNumberish): Promise<TransactionResult>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  tokenId | BigNumberish |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[TransactionResult](./sdk.transactionresult.md)<!-- -->&gt;

## Remarks

Burn NFTs held by the connected wallet

## Example


```javascript
// The token ID of the NFT you want to burn
const tokenId = 0;

await contract.nft.burn.fromSelf(tokenId);
```
